sql.sql: select t.* from Yh_Jmssqspb_Mx t where t.lcslid = ?

select rcsyuuid, djxh, lcslid, scyj, scyjsm, scrxm, scrq, sfbzzl, bzzlmc_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, sfxxbgbuuid from rd_fjmxsssxdrcsyb t where t.lcslid = ?
select t.* from yh_syjmbaxx t where t.yhpzuuid = $uuid$

select sp.yhpzuuid, sp.djxh, sp.jmsspsx_dm, sp.zsxm_dm, sp.zspm_dm, sp.jmxmdl_dm, sp.jmxmxl_dm, sp.jmwj_dm, sp.jmlx_dm, sp.jmfs_dm, sp.jmzlx_dm, sp.ssjmxzhz_dm, sp.ssjmxzdl_dm, sp.ssjmxzxl_dm, sy.sybh_1, sy.jmqxq, sy.jmqxz, sy.jzed, sy.jzfd, sy.jzsl, sy.qxbz, sy.lrrq from yh_jmsspjg sp, yh_syjmbaxx sy where sp.yhpzuuid = sy.yhpzuuid and sp.djxh = ? and sp.yxbz = ? and sp.zfbz_1 = ? and sy.qxbz = ? and (? is null or sp.zsxm_dm = ?) and(? is null or sp.zspm_dm = ? or sp.zspm_dm is null) and (? is null or sp.jmsspsx_dm = ?) and (? is null or ? is null or (sy.jmqxq < = ? and sy.sjjzrq > = ?)) and sy.sjjzrq > = sy.jmqxq

select yhpzuuid, djxh, lcslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmqxq, jmqxz, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jzfd, jzsl, jzed, sjjzrq, wszg, yxbz, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, ssjmsblm_dm, lmdybz, ztrq, qxbz from yh_jmsspjg where djxh = ? and yxbz = 'Y' and zfbz_1 = 'N' and (? is null or zsxm_dm = ?) and ((jmqxq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) or (to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between jmqxq and sjjzrq)) and sjjzrq >= jmqxq

select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, jg.yhpzuuid, jg.jmsspsx_dm, jg.jmqxq, jg.jmqxz, jg.sjjzrq, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.ztrq from dj_nsrxx nsr, yh_jmsspjg jg where nsr.djxh = jg.djxh and (nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and jg.jmsspsx_dm = ? and jg.zfbz_1 = ? and nsr.yxbz = ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm not in (?, ?, ?) and jg.jmqxz > jg.jmqxq union all select zrr.djxh, zrr.nsrsbh, zrr.xm nsrmc, jg.yhpzuuid, jg.jmsspsx_dm, jg.jmqxq, jg.jmqxz, jg.sjjzrq, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.ztrq from dj_zrr zrr, yh_jmsspjg jg where zrr.djxh = jg.djxh and zrr.nsrsbh = ? and jg.jmsspsx_dm = ? and jg.zfbz_1 = ? and zrr.yxbz = ? and jg.jmqxz > jg.jmqxq
Select t.* From WBJH_YSPZ_FJSJB_LS t Where t.yspzywzj_2 = ? and t.yspzfjztxx != 7
select * from wbjh_yspz_fjsjb where yspzfjlsh = ? and yspzfjztxx != 7
select t.* from Dj_Ysqywslxxb t where t.lcslid = ?
select t.* from yh_syjmbaxx t where t.yhpzuuid = ?
select * from wbjh_yspz_fjsjb_ls where yspzfjlsh = ? and yspzfjztxx != 7
select t.* from yh_syjmbaxx t where t.yhpzuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and (t.sjjzrq is null or t.sjjzrq >= t.jmqxq) and sjjzrq >= to_date(?, ?)

select wm_concat(t.swsx_dm) swsxdms from cs_yh_jmswsxhtjkpzb t where t.swjg_dm in (select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and t.xybz = ? and t.yxbz = ?
select t.* from yh_clcbjmbaxx t where t.lcslid = ?
select t.swsx_dm from cs_yh_qysdsdqjmsxb t where t.yxbz='Y'
select t.* from yh_jmsspjg t where t.djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = ? and t.yxbz = ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.jmsspsx_dm in(#macroparam#)) and sjjzrq >= jmqxq

select qxuuid, c.yhpzuuid, a.lcslid, hdslid, a.djxh, ssyhzgqxyy_dm, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, qdswjg_dm, qxyy, qxrq, gljy_dm, gljysm, b.nsrsbh, a.ztrq, b.xm nsrmc, c.jmsspsx_dm, c.jmqxq, c.jmqxz, c.sjjzrq, c.zsxm_dm from dj_zrr b, yh_ssyhzgqxsqspb a, yh_jmsspjg c where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.yhpzuuid = c.yhpzuuid and a.lcslid = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y'
select c.SLSWSX_DM,c.LCBCZL_DM,c.BCZLBXBZ,d.lcbczlnr from CS_YH_SLSWSXYBCZLDZB c,DM_YH_QYSDSLCBCZL d where slswsx_dm = ? and c.LCBCZL_DM=d.LCBCZL_DM and d.yxbz= ? and d.xybz= ?

select t.bamxuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.clgzsmjstj_dm, t.clsbdh, t.jmse, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.yhpzuuid, t.lxhgryzmbh, t.zgdhm, t.zgdfzjg, t.nsrlxlx_dm, t.lxgjmc, t.brhzhm, t.zjzhm, t.zjzfzrq, t.zjzyxqz, t.mstcbbh, t.mstcym, t.jmsyj, t.sblm, t.lmdybs from YH_Clgzsjmbaxx t, yh_jmsspjg jms where t.clgzsmjstj_dm = ? and t.brhzhm = ? and jms.yhpzuuid = t.yhpzuuid(+) and jms.zfbz_1 = 'N' and jms.yxbz = 'Y' and jms.qxbz = 'N' and jms.sjjzrq > = jms.jmqxq

select sp.yhpzuuid, sp.djxh, sp.jmsspsx_dm, sp.zsxm_dm, sp.zspm_dm, sp.jmxmdl_dm, sp.jmxmxl_dm, sp.jmwj_dm, sp.jmlx_dm, sp.jmfs_dm, sp.jmzlx_dm, sp.ssjmxzhz_dm, sp.ssjmxzdl_dm, sp.ssjmxzxl_dm, mx.* from YH_JMSSPJG sp, yh_syjmbaxx mx where sp.yhpzuuid = mx.yhpzuuid and sp.djxh = ? and sp.jmsspsx_dm = ? and sp.ssjmxzhz_dm in (#macroparam#) and mx.sybh_1 =? and (mx.jmqxq <= to_date( ? , 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) and (to_date( ?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= decode( mx.sjjzrq, '',mx.jmqxz, mx.sjjzrq ) ) and sp.zfbz_1 =? and mx.zfbz_1 =?

select yhpzuuid, djxh, lcslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmqxq, jmqxz, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jzfd, jzsl, jzed, sjjzrq, wszg, yxbz, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1,ssjmsblm_dm,lmdybz,ztrq,qxbz from yh_jmsspjg where djxh = ? and yxbz = 'Y' and zfbz_1 = 'N' and ( ? is null or zsxm_dm = ?) and ( ? is null or zspm_dm = ? or zspm_dm is null) and ( sjjzrq >= to_date( ?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and jmqxq <= to_date( ?,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) and sjjzrq >= jmqxq
Select t.* from wbjh_yh_clgzsmstc t Where t.cltpw Like ?
select m.tzmxuuid,m.djxh,m.sssqq,m.sssqz,m.jmse,m.lrr_dm,m.lrrq,m.sjgsdq,m.zgrs from yh_xejmtzxx_mx m where m.djxh=? and m.sbuuid = ? and m.yzpzxh = ?
select t.* from YH_Jmsspjg t where t.lcslid = ?

select zrr.djxh, zrr.nsrsbh, zrr.xm nsrmc, jg.yhpzuuid, jg.jmsspsx_dm, jg.jmqxq, jg.jmqxz, jg.sjjzrq, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.ztrq from dj_zrr zrr, yh_jmsspjg jg where zrr.djxh = jg.djxh and jg.jmsspsx_dm = ? and jg.zfbz_1 = ? and zrr.yxbz = ? and jg.jmqxz > jg.jmqxq
select t.* from Yh_Jmssqspb t where t.lcslid = ?
select t.ssyhzgqxyy_dm,t.qxrq from yh_ssyhzgqxsqspb t where t.zstybz='Y' and t.djxh=? union all select t.ssyhzgqxyy_dm,t.qxrq from Yh_Ssyhzgglmxb t where t.djxh=?

Select t.mstcuuid, t.bbuuid, t.lcslid, t.nh, t.nnch, t.mslb_dm, t.msmx_dm, t.cp, t.xh_3, t.scqymc, t.lrrq, t.zch, t.cltpn, t.cltpw From WBJH_YH_CLGZSMSTC_LS t Where (1 = ? Or t.cp Like ?) And (1 = ? Or t.xh_3 Like ?) Order By t.nh Desc, t.nnch Desc
select t.* from wbjh_yspz_fjsjb t where t.yspzywzj_2 = ? and t.yspzfjztxx != 7

select t.uuid, t.cxmlpc_dm, t.xnyqcxsccsyhcx_dm, t.clxh, t.tymc, t.cpmc_1, t.fdjpl, t.hdzkrs, t.xs_1, t.dws, t.pfbz_1, t.rlxhl, t.zhgkrlxhl, t.zczbzl, t.rlnyzlmc, t.ztgczzl, t.zdsjzzl, t.clcp, t.cddxslc, t.dlxdczzzl, t.dlxdczznl, t.jmzlx_dm, t.bz, t.qdr_dm, t.qdrq, t.qdswjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.jnxqclb_dm, t.clscqy_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.zfbz_1 from yh_ccsssyhqccxml t where (1 = ? or t.cxmlpc_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.clscqy_dm = ?) and (1=? or t.jnxqclb_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.xnyqcxsccsyhcx_dm = ?) and t.jmzlx_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select t.swsx_dm from cs_yh_fzjgkbayhsxb t where t.yxbz='Y'

select yhpzuuid, djxh, lcslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmqxq, jmqxz, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jzfd, jzsl, jzed, yxbz, htmc, htbh from yh_jmsspjg t where t.YFXMBH = ? and yxbz = 'Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ((jmqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and sjjzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) or (jmqxq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and sjjzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) or (jmqxq > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and sjjzrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'))) and sjjzrq >= jmqxq

select t.uuid, t.cxmlpc_dm, t.xnyqcxsccsyhcx_dm, t.clxh, t.tymc, t.cpmc_1, t.fdjpl, t.hdzkrs, t.xs_1, t.dws, t.pfbz_1, t.rlxhl, t.zhgkrlxhl, t.zczbzl, t.rlnyzlmc, t.ztgczzl, t.zdsjzzl, t.clcp, t.cddxslc, t.dlxdczzzl, t.dlxdczznl, t.jmzlx_dm, t.bz, t.qdr_dm, t.qdrq, t.qdswjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.jnxqclb_dm, t.clscqy_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.zfbz_1 from yh_ccsssyhqccxml t where (1 = ? or t.cxmlpc_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.clscqy_dm = ?) and (1=? or t.jnxqclb_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.xnyqcxsccsyhcx_dm = ?) and t.jmzlx_dm = ? and t.clxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
